title: I legitly got permabanned for no reason.
body:
So apparently  I was being boosted due to unusual increase in my MMR using Caitlyn. Riot said that my stats with Caitlyn did not match my stats with other champions, and they noticed another IP(my desktop), would occasionally log on to the account to play.

Riot is fucking stupid. They won't reverse the ban either. I don't understand how me being a good Caitlyn warrants a ban.
